Docs.param: Type of backup managemenent for the backed up item. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'AzureIaasVM', 'MAB', 'DPM', 'AzureBackupServer', 'AzureSql', 'AzureStorage', 'AzureWorkload', 'DefaultBackup'
ARM ID of the resource to be backed up.
ID of the item which is getting protected, In case of Azure Vm , it is ProtectedItemId
ID of the backup policy with which this item is backed up.
Backup state of this backup item. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'NotProtected', 'Protecting', 'Protected', 'ProtectionFailed'
Friendly name of the VM represented by this backup item.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets friendly name of the VM represented by this backup item.
